entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
